```{r 01010102setup, include=FALSE}
## 01010102 Arithmetic mean from a table of relative frequencies.
```


```{r echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
## DATA GENERATION
signifDig <- 4

n = sample(15:20, 1)

data = c(sample(-10:10, n, replace=TRUE))

(frequencies = as.vector(table(data)))
(relFrequencies = signif(frequencies / n, 4))
(orderedUniqueValues = sort(unique(data)))
#(frecTableForQuestion = cbind(orderedUniqueValues, frequencies))

(chooseValue = sample(data, 1))

## QUESTION/ANSWER GENERATION
(sol = mean(data))
# (sol2 = sum(orderedUniqueValues * relFrequencies))

(sol = signif(sol, signifDig))
```


```{r eval=(language == "en"), echo=FALSE, results='hide'}
question=paste0("Given the set of unique values $$", paste0(orderedUniqueValues, collapse = ", "),"$$ and their relative frequencies  $$", paste0(relFrequencies, collapse = ", "),"$$ find the **arithmetic mean** of this data set.")

answer=paste0("The answer is ",
  sol
)

```
